评论详情: I love this shirt so far! It’s super soft and comfy plus cute, and it’s not too tight or too loose on me.

评论概述: It’s okay but I won’t buy it again
评论详情: Overall the shirt was nice but I won’t be buying it again. I am 5’2 and 195lbs. I was hoping the fit would have been a little more loose based on photos but it’s definitely form fitting which I’m not a big fan of because I’m a more curvy girl who is self conscious of my belly. My biggest issue though is that it’s very see through. I bought this shirt in white and even with a white bra underneath you can clearly see right through to my bra and make out everything underneath. If I wanted to wear it out I’d have to wear a tank top underneath to make sure nothing was showing.
Good quality fabric. Medium weight to wear in any season. Perfect for a basic. The waist is a bit short.
Nice fit
Fits perfectly and has easily become my favorite shirt to wear to the office. Writing this review right before I look to buy more
Fit well, decent quality, more than I thought for the price.
Have this top in several colors. Very flattering.
The sizing is pretty accurate but it’s a little bulky on the shoulders Though I would buy every color as it fits so well and it feels soft and warm but breathable Washes and dries well too

评论概述: Love it! Getting in more colors!
评论详情: Love the fit! Sooo soft and perfect for work casual
The feeling is great and fix perfectly

评论概述: The shoulder seem was off - update
评论详情: I liked the material and fit, but the shoulder seem caught the sleeve and left a big hole. I didn't notice until I wore it once and it was too late to return it. The seller reached out and refunded the item for me. My original rating was 2 stars, but I upped it by one because of their customer service. I will try this company again next time I am looking for work clothes.
Me encantó su color y su textura . Se siente muy cómodo y calentito sin ser lana axsficiante. Pues estoy en Miami en días frescos

I was impressed by the excellent quality of this top, and the material is just the right thickness.  It has super stretch to it that makes it not too clingy.  Great buy for the money!  Very flattering!!
Shirt is just the right thickness and fits so flattering. Got compliments at work.
This shirt is thick and soft in a good way. It’s so flattering perfect for business casual or casual. Very great material I’ve ordered it in other colors. True to size.

This ZESICA tee is a solid basic. The ribbed knit gives it a bit more shape than your average t-shirt, and the fit is flattering. It's comfortable for everyday wear and the fabric feels good against the skin. I've already gotten a lot of wear out of it this summer.

评论用户: Product really work but you’ll need a spread board to use for you face a little thicker you spread it’s easy to peel off
评论概述: Get a medium if your a large
评论详情: The blouse is so wonderful the fabric, and the thickness  I love it and I’m satisfied with my choice
Soft material, flexible and thick enough that it’s not see through!  Washes well and would buy again
Love this top this is my second top from them and the fabric, weight and feel are great. Will be buying more later.

This is a very nice top, great quality.  The fabric is stretchy and feels comfortable.  The fit is very flattering.  I usually wear it with a sweater in the winter.  I bought a Dustyblue first.  Loved it so much that I bought a white one.  I put it in the washer and dry on low heat.

The color and weight of the shirt was nice and warm. It was very flattering and a nice texture. There was no smell when it arrived to my house. I like layering my clothes and I wore mine comfortably with a cardigan all day. I can see myself wearing it with multiple outfits and styles.
I get compliments every time I wear this top. It looks super high end without the cost! Will be ordering in other colors!
Fits as expected, very comfortable

I am 5'6, 148 lbs and ordered a large - it is a little small. It is a style that is supposed to be slim fitting, but I would have liked it to be just a bit bigger, but I wore it with a light cardigan sweater and jeans, and it looked nice. It is very cute and looks like it is pictured. The material is soft and very comfortable.

评论概述: Arrived used, stained, inside out, no tag, cologne
评论详情: This shirt arrived inside out, with no tag, and stains all over it. It also smelled like somebody’s perfume. This has absolutely been heavily used, and I’m disgusted that it was sent to me!

One of my favorite recent purchases.  Fits to the size chart listed.  The ribbing adds to the nice look of it for sure.  The length is perfect for me and I'm 6' tall so it goes down to the top of my hip.  If you want to cover more of your butt and are tall this top would not meet your needs. The thickness is perfect (on the lighter side) in that it wears well under flannel tops.  The sleeve length is the perfect length...not too short and not too long.  The neck curve is not too high or too low so necklaces look nice resting against.  Highly recommend.  I will be buying several more colors.
the material is amazing! very easy to dress this up and down. I bought it in several colors.

I was looking for cute shirts to go under overalls or flannels. These are SO SOFT and stretchy. I personally don't like the shape of my stomach as having a baby but I think it would definitely look good by itself woth some jeans. Great quality as well

评论概述: My research paid off big time with this product!
评论详情: Have Vera Wang short sleeve knit top I love bc suitable for year-round and wanted in more colors but couldnt find -- until saw on Amazon as Black Friday Deal -- but concerned as to whether fabric same or similar to my Vera Wang. It seemed close enough but ordered just one  so could be sure. Feared would arrive after Black Friday and thus too late to order more if liked. It arrived in one day and just ordered four more colors. Quality equal to my Vera Wang, neckline, sleeve and total length exactly what wanted.Recommend.
It’s perfect! So stretchy and soft!
Great quality top! I could see it being super versatile. And the material is thick and soft and will probably wash really well but for me it was just not flattering.
Not sheer
I bought this in the beige color.  It fits perfectly and is comfortable, not tight fitting.. I'm 5'4", 112 lbs and ordered an Xsmall. Soft cable knit fabric.
Pretty color
Great sweater, but feels a little shorter than I usually wear.  Take that into consideration, consider one size up from your usual.
I would size up
Very cute and versatile. Super soft and comfy. It is great quality for the price. I machine wash and hang dry and it is still brand new.
Lovely top. Washed well and doesn’t stretch out or lose its shape. Will be buying in other colors! Goes great with jeans or dress pants. Great addition to any wardrobe!
I like the shirt it just puckers at the bottom if not tucked in and it makes it look lumpy. Otherwise I really like it.

Not flattering. Color was more vibrant; I thought it would be more muted. If I was a bean pole it would look better but I have chunky arms and thought this really accentuated that. The thickness of the fabric also made me feel chunky.
Good quality material. The oatmeal color is pretty. But it's a basic top, nothing too special about it and for $20 seems overpriced. The sleeves are very short and not as long as the item photo.
The shape ,color, the softness, the fit the size all was perfect.
I cant say enough about this top - it is my go to!! Truly a great top for casual or work. Love it

Comfort - 10/10 Style - 10/10 Color - 10/10, looks just like the photos  Super cute and basic, it doesn’t choke your body, the material is breathable and you can layer clothes. It still holds its shape after washing, the material doesn’t get you overheated. Perfect essential top!
I ordered this shirt in 2 colors, the black and pink.. both very nice quality and fits true to size

Most fave shirt ordered from Amazon. It’s stretchy, soft, and perfect length! I bought the beige/tan, and about to buy a black one. I’m 5’3, 143 lbs and bought a size medium. Large probably would’ve been a bit loose/baggy.

I was looking for a shirt that would be business casual for work, but also comfortable, and based on the reviews, I decided to give this a try. I love it!! So much that I bought it in 3 other colors! It's soft and stretchy, but thick enough material that the stretchy doesn't reveal any 5-kids-later body imperfections that I'd rather not showcase! :) I usually wear a medium, so that's what I ordered, and it fits perfectly! I was initially unsure when I took it out of the bag, because it looked tiny, but like I said, because of the stretchiness, it fits great. Super soft, washed great. I didn't put it in the dryer, just hung it to dry, and there was no shrinking

I ended up ordering 4 of these shirts. I like the feel of the fabric and how it fits on the torso. There's a nice stretch to them. I pair them with my high waisted skirts. The downside to them is that the shoulders are not consistent. They don't always sit flat and may stick up. I feel like for larger sizes they need to sew the shoulders a bit wider.
I expected to receive the shade of blue shown in Amazon but it's not that vibrant. It's darker and disappointing.
I love my blouse because, is thick, comfortable and nice quality. I wear it with dressy pants or jeans.

I had to return this. I usually wear ribbed shirts but this one the feel of the material doesn't sit right with me. It's too 'slippery' feel like not cotton material. I ordered x-small and the fit wasn't right either. It just made me look bulky for some reason. It might be that the color is too neutral for my face tone but overall not flattering at all.
I love the material and color. The fit is very nice as well. I highly recommend! I wear an 34DD and size medium fits great. I could have ordered a small but I like having a little room.
i have 2 already in different color, they are soft, comfortable, good stretch, great quality, good price, true size and makes you look chic when dressed up.
fits comfortably and is very soft. good quality material. my only gripe is it’s not very long but i’m still able to tuck it into my high waisted pants
Fits good, nice color

I bought 2 of these tops. I am 5’8” and 135 lbs. Got mediums. They fit well, close to the body. I like the torso and sleeve lengths. The tops skim the top of my hips. I haven’t tried to tuck them in (really not my style) so I can’t speak to that. One review said a horizontal wrinkle/line appeared (under the bust) if they slouched and I found the same thing happened to me. Maybe multiple washings will lessen that issue (I’m washing in cold water and laying flat to dry). It encourages me to stand up straight. 😃 I live in hot, humid South Florida and these tops are quite thick. But I guess I’d call them a medium weight as I have knit tops that are both lighter and heavier than these. Overall, I like them and would buy more.
I like them both , them fit snug and perfect for under my jackets  👍
I love the fabric quality. It hugs the body well and the color is true, but i noticed that it gets rather hot. Maybe I should wear it more for the Fall.
I love the assortment of colors. Fit is perfect. Quality of fabric very soft.

This top is great! The colors are vibrant. I love the feel of the material and it is lightweight. I also love the fit; I wear a size large, but it still has a nice fit. It washes well, doesn't lose it's shape. It's very versatile, you can dress it up or wear it with jeans. I will purchase more colors.
I ordered size Large, but it fit like an extra small.  Had to return
I love this shirt! The fabric is soft and stretchy the material is good quality. It is a little short and will ride up if not tucked in.
Cute top. I would recommend sizing 1 up. It was a tight fitting shirt (which is what it’s supposed to be), however the arms were too tight.
I love the fit of this shirt. It’s quite comfortable and easy to dress up for work.

I was not expecting the material to be so thick. Still really cute however, I have both the black and white color and when I slouch a little it makes this crazy crease. It’s more noticeable on the white, but you can still see it on the back.

I have purchased this in 3 colors, now. It’s so soft and comfy. The first two I purchased in M but decided to purchase the 3rd in L. They both fit but after washing/drying the M were a little shorter than my personal preference. Will continue to purchase as I’m serial for having a basic I love in multiple colors!
Great material Fits amazing !! True to size very soft .the color is perfect not to thin great weight
love this top! super soft and comfortable, would order again. fits true to size
run small
It is soft. The sleeves are the perfect length. It’s not too tight or long on the abdomen. Perfect to tuck in

Love the material. Super comfortable and cute. Perfect for work
Love this top
Love how cute this top is! And quality is not bad.
Perfect fee
Beautiful material and workmanship. I wish I could keep it but the style is too body-hugging for my personal preference.
This is a lovely sweater. It is very stretchy but still very fitted. This works for me because I bought it to wear under a blazer.
perfect fit soft Worth the money paid.doesn’t have a smell
The color did not match the picture. The tan is more yellow and completely washes me out. Can’t wear it because it looks so bad.
I am surprised by the quality. It’s thick and flattering and so cute!

I don't take picture's but this shirt is so nice! I think you can wear it pretty casually as well as dress it up. It feels like really nice material. Don't be scared when it arrives, it looks very small but has great stretch to it. I ordered the biggest size they have and it fits perfectly. I am about 5ft 6in and weigh 220lbs.

This shirt is so flattering. Hits a little longer on the waist so it’s perfectly tuckable. Feels thick/heavyweight almost like a sweater but not quite, expensive, yet super stretchy and forgiving. Extremely flattering on the curves. I’ll def be purchasing more colors. I’m 5’4”, 145lbs, I’m a size 6 jeans in American eagle jeans and a size medium in tops/dresses from Abercrombie for reference. I purchased a size medium and would repurchase in this size.

评论概述: My wife bought a few of these
评论详情: My wife bought a few of these and after wearing it and taking the tags off she noticed a while in the seam along the shoulder blades. It’s a pretty thick shirt and super flattering. It’s cute to wear in the winter with a sweater because it’s warm and she wears them at least once a week and they’re still great!
Nice thick material. Super comfy, washed well and didn’t shrink. Love it for work or with jeans.

OMG...soft and stretchy.  When I opened the package I thought there is no way this will fit me. To my surprise it stretched yet keep the form and looked great. This piece of clothing is so versatile. It can be worn with jeans for a casual look, to the office with a blazer, or out to dinner with a nice heel, pants an accessories.
The material is of great quality. Easy to dress up or down.
Fits well and good quality
It fits true to size and is well-fitted without feeling restrictive. It hasn't shrunk from washing cold, and it hang dries well.
This shirt is amazing! Soft and fits perfectly!

I love this shirt so much I bought four versions! The fabric is very stretchy and a good weight - not anything that is suffocating, but just overall decent quality. For example, the white coloreay is opaque (at least when wearing a nude bra) so you don't have to worry about it being see through. The high neckline makes this very work appropriate and it looks nice, especially with a dainty necklace like seen in the sample photo.  I am usually either a L/XL/1X depending on the brand and my bra size is a 40D. I went with the XL and found it fit well. I could fit into a Large given the stretchiness, but the XL is comfortable.
It was baggy at the arms
Loved
I'm 5'4 182 pounds,  40 chest and the large was perfect!!!! So Soft fits perfectly just tight enough but not too tight absolutely love it we'll get it in more colors
The shirt and color were nice but the sleeves were a little long for me (for a short sleeve).
This top is probably fitted off of Asian sizes. My daughter is 5'3" and 120 pounds. It fits snug in the shoulders and the waist and she could have gone to a medium.
Fits perfectly and is just the right thickness for autumn. I’m thinking about getting another one or two.

The blue color is beautiful, the material is soft and the weight of the shirt is just right. It's easy to wash and keeps its shape. Very versatile shirt and fits with jeans, stretch pants and skirts. It has started to lightly pill but it's not too bad.

评论概述: Shoulder horns out of the bag
评论详情: The color and fit is cute. Not too tight that it looks like skin, especially because the color. It’s a little thick fabric and stylish. My complaint is these ugly little shoulder horns that it has. It looks like when a shirt hangs on a metal hanger for years and gets stretched. However, it came out of the bag like that and has never hung on a hanger. The shirt is cheap enough that I don’t plan on wearing this much more before donating, but just a heads up that the bumps are unsightly.
Super cute and comfortable. Can be dressed down for every day or dressed up for more business casual outfits

I bought a medium in toffee and it is a slim fit, as the description suggests. The fit is okay, a little small in the shoulders. I love the color toffee is great dark caramel. I also bought almond in large, love the fit. Not too fitted, just right. The fabric for both is nice weight, not too thin or too thick. 34c, 139 pounds, 5’4 for reference
